tags.name: ns-icon

attributes.name: size

The size of the icon.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the icon and needs to be in kebab case.

properties.description:
The size of the icon.
The empty value of `size` will make the icon to fill the parent element.

tags.name: ns-timeline-event
tags.description: A partial component for the timeline, to show an event.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: The status of the event.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: The decorative icon to provide visual aid to the content of the event.

attributes.name: index
attributes.description: The index to indicate logical order of the event in the timeline.

attributes.name: updated-at
attributes.description: The optional date and time of the `completed ` event.

attributes.name: updatedat
attributes.description: Use `updated-at` attribute.

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the event.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: The decorative icon to provide visual aid to the content of the event.

properties.name: index

properties.name: updatedAt

slots.name: heading

The content of the event.

tags.name: ns-timeline
tags.description: Represents a sequence of events that happen within a process, and shows the status.

attributes.name: show-step-count
attributes.description: The toggle to display the completed vs total step count to represent the progress.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of the timeline.

attributes.name: showstepcount
attributes.description: Use `show-step-count` attribute.

properties.name: showstepcount
properties.description: The toggle to display the completed vs total step count to represent the progress.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the timeline.

slots.name: heading
slots.description: The heading to describe the process that the timeline represents.

slots.name: summary
slots.description: The optional summary to manage the expectation of the process.

slots.name: event
slots.description: The individual step in the process.

tags.name: ns-testimonial

tags.name: ns-tabs
tags.description: Tabs provide organisation of content separated within the same context.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: The index of the tab to open.

properties.name: open
properties.description: The index of the tab to open.

events.name: tabchange
events.description: Dispatched when the selected tab is changed.

slots.name: tab
slots.description: The set of tabs displayed in the order they are added.

slots.name: panel
slots.description:
The set of content panels.
The panels are mapped to the respective tabs in the same order as they are added.

tags.name: ns-table
tags.description:
Table displays information in a grid-like format of rows and columns.
It organizes information in a way thatâ€™s easy to scan, so that users
can look for patterns and insights.

attributes.name: label-id
attributes.description: The identifier of the element outside the table element.

properties.name: slottedStyles
properties.description: Styles for slotted elements.

slots.description: The anonymous slot for html table element.

tags.name: ns-tab
tags.description: The singular tab that dictates what the area is about.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: The toggle to show the content associated with the tab.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: The decorative icon provide visual aid to tab content.

attributes.name: role
attributes.description:
The read-only accessibility feature to indicate
the tab will display the associated content in `tabpanel` role when selected.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: The toggle to show the content associated with the tab.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: The decorative icon provide visual aid to tab content.

properties.name: role
properties.description:
The read-only accessibility feature to indicate
the tab will display the associated content in `tabpanel` role when selected.

events.name: tabselected
events.description: Dispatched with the tab is selected.

slots.description: The text of the tab that needs to be related to the content of the associated element with `tabpanel` role.

tags.name: ns-skyline

The type of skeleton and

The type of skeleton and
it is assigned automatically depending on the wrapper element.
This is required when the type is not related to the wrapper element.

tags.name: ns-selector

properties.name: image

The link to the image.
The visual in the image needs to be related to the content of the selector option.

properties.name: keyline

slots.name: description
slots.description:
The description of the selector and needs to be short and clear.
It is required when `decoration` is used and optional when `image` is used.
The anonymous slot for form elements such as input and label.

tags.name: ns-progress

attributes.name: steps

attributes.name: complete

attributes.name: current

slots.name: name

The price heading of the product and
the heading level needs to one level lower than the heading level of the product.

slots.name: expander

slots.name: cta
slots.description: The interactive content to link to the product page.

tags.name: ns-price
tags.description: A standardised way to show how GBP prices are displayed.

attributes.name: pence
attributes.description:
The price in pence denomination to prevent the crawlling of unformatted price
by the search engines and subsequently displaying the wrong price in the search results.

attributes.name: show-decimal
attributes.description: The toggle to show the decimal places when price is an integer.

attributes.name: negative
attributes.description:
The toggle to show the price in negative.
It eliminates the use of various of characters for the minus symbol.

attributes.name: showdecimal
attributes.description: Use `show-decimal` attribute.

properties.name: pence
properties.description:
The price in pence denomination to prevent the crawlling of unformatted price
by the search engines and subsequently displaying the wrong price in the search results.

properties.name: showDecimal

properties.name: negative
properties.description:
The toggle to show the price in negative.
It eliminates the use of various of characters for the minus symbol.

tags.name: ns-inputter
tags.description:
A component to allow for user inputs of type text, radio, checkbox, select,
date, tel, number, textarea, search.

attributes.name: helper
attributes.description: The helper text for the input.

attributes.name: open-helper
attributes.description: The toggle to open the helper text.

attributes.name: validation
attributes.description: The list of validations to validate the value of the input.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the input to reference in form data.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the input. It holds comma separated value for multi-input (eg., checkbox).

attributes.name: labelID
attributes.description: The ID of the label element if outside of the component.

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: The heading to group related checkbox or radio inputs.

attributes.name: mask
attributes.description: A mask to show the format of the input. The value length is limited by the mask length.

attributes.name: separator
attributes.description: A separator character to be used in the mask format.

attributes.name: ignore-separator
attributes.description: The toggle to ignore the separator while validating tthe length of the `value`.

attributes.name: ignoreseparator
attributes.description: Use `ignore-separator` attribute.

attributes.name: ishelperopen
attributes.description: Use `open-helper` attribute.

properties.name: helper
properties.description: The helper text for the input.

properties.name: isHelperOpen
properties.description: The toggle to open the helper text.

properties.name: isPristine
properties.description: A getter method to get pristine state of the form element.

properties.name: isDirty
properties.description: A getter method to get dirty state of the form element.

properties.name: validity
properties.description: A getter method to get validity of the form element.

properties.name: validationMessage
properties.description: A method to get a validation message combind from the validity states.

properties.name: validation
properties.description: The list of validations to validate the value of the input.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the input to reference in form data.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the input. It holds comma separated value for multi-input (eg., checkbox).

properties.name: labelID
properties.description: The ID of the label element if outside of the component.

properties.name: heading
properties.description: The heading to group related checkbox or radio inputs.

properties.name: mask
properties.description: A mask to show the format of the input. The value length is limited by the mask length.

properties.name: separator
properties.description: A separator character to be used in the mask format.

properties.name: ignoreSeparator
properties.description: The toggle to ignore the separator while validating tthe length of the `value`.

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatched when the input value changes. It holds the value of the input.

events.name: helper-toggle
events.description: Dispatched when the helper is toggled. It holds the value of the `open` state of the helper.

slots.name: label
slots.description:
The label for the input. The label content needs to be related to the purpose of the value.
This is required for single input types (text, email, etc).

slots.name: tip-details
slots.description: The tip details related to the `helper` text of the inputter.
The form element wrapped by the inputter.

tags.name: ns-cta
tags.description: A call-to-action allows users to take action once they are ready for it.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description:
The link to another page or section in the same page. This eliminates the use of a wrapper anchor tag.
It should not be used when `click` event listener is added.

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: The toggle to change to `loading` state.

attributes.name: loading-message
attributes.description: The message to display in the CTA text when toggled to `loading` state.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: The decorative icon and needs to be related to the text content.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of the CTA to choose for the purpose.

attributes.name: loadingmessage
attributes.description: Use `loading-message` attribute.

properties.name: href
properties.description:
The link to another page or section in the same page. This eliminates the use of a wrapper anchor tag.
It should not be used when `click` event listener is added.

properties.name: loading
properties.description: The toggle to change to `loading` state.

properties.name: loadingMessage
properties.description: The message to display in the CTA text when toggled to `loading` state.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: The decorative icon and needs to be related to the text content.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the CTA to choose for the purpose.

events.name: click
events.description: Dispatched when the CTA is clicked.

slots.description: The anonymous slot for text content and needs to be related to the action performed by the CTA.

tags.name: ns-image

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: The link of the image.

attributes.name: background
attributes.description: The toggle to indicate the image needs to be added as decorative background.

attributes.name: background-size
attributes.description: The background size of the image.

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description:
The alternate text of the image and needs to be related to the visual content in the image.
This is required for non decorative images.

attributes.name: ratio
attributes.description: The aspect ratio of the image.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description:
The placeholder image to be displayed while the specified image in `src` is loading.
`(src)` can be used to place src into the placeholder.

attributes.description: The loading strategy of the image.

attributes.name: backgroundsize
attributes.description: Use `background-size` attribute.

The alternate text of the image and needs to be related to the visual content in the image.
This is required for non decorative images.

properties.description: The aspect ratio of the image.

properties.name: placeholder

The placeholder image to be displayed while the specified image in `src` is loading.
`(src)` can be used to place src into the placeholder.

properties.description: The loading strategy of the image.

tags.name: ns-date-time
tags.description: A standardised way to show the date and time.

attributes.name: date
attributes.description:
The date to display inline with British Gas tone of voice.
The time part follows 24 hours format ending with am/pm.
When using timezone as part of the date be cautious to consider British Summer Time.

attributes.name: hide-date
attributes.description: The toggle to hide the date from display.

attributes.name: hide-time
attributes.description: The toggle to hide the time from display.

attributes.name: hide-day
attributes.description: The toggle to hide the day from the display.

attributes.name: hide-month
attributes.description: The toggle to hide the month from the display.

attributes.name: hide-year
attributes.description: The toggle to hide the year from the display.

properties.description:
The date to display inline with British Gas tone of voice.
The time part follows 24 hours format ending with am/pm.
When using timezone as part of the date be cautious to consider British Summer Time.

properties.description: The toggle to hide the date from display.

properties.name: hideTime
properties.description: The toggle to hide the time from display.

properties.name: hideDay
properties.description: The toggle to hide the day from the display.

properties.name: hideMonth
properties.description: The toggle to hide the month from the display.

properties.name: hideYear
properties.description: The toggle to hide the year from the display.
